rpg.game.map

Class PositionBehavior2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpg.game.actor.behavior.BaseBehaviorComponent
      • rpg.game.map.PositionBehavior2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>, Behavior, Position

    public class PositionBehavior2D
extends BaseBehaviorComponent
implements Position
    Behavior component that represents an actor with a visible position on a map.

      • adjacentTo

        public boolean adjacentTo(Position p)
        Tests to see if the passed position is adjacent to this position. In this case "adjacent" means in a square of the map where it can be interacted with. Therefore, diagonal does not count.
        Specified by:
        adjacentTo in interface Position

      • onTopOf

        public boolean onTopOf(Position p)
        Specified by:

      • act

        public boolean act(int id)
        Perform self act operations. PositionBehavior2D objects don't act on their own.
        Specified by:
        act in interface Behavior
        Specified by:
        act in class BaseBehaviorComponent
        Returns:
        boolean True if the behavior was a success, and false otherwise. Purpose of the return depends on the system calling act().

      • actOn

        public boolean actOn(int id,
            Actor other)
        Draw the Actor's icon on the map.
        Specified by:

        Specified by:
        actOn in class BaseBehaviorComponent
        Parameters:

        Returns:
